sdumitriu - (18:27): CalebJamesDeLisl: Ping  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:47): sdumitriu: ping  
sdumitriu - (18:47): I have a Greasemonkey script for Jira, do you want it?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:48): Sure, does it sign me in automatically? ;)  
sdumitriu - (18:48): Nope, it makes it easier to copy/paste the issue title for commits  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:49): Ahh yes that's aggravating too.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:51): About this db stuff, I'd really like to see some kind of security advisory about it. I know there are a lot of users who won't care but I think we should make a point of looking out for those who do.  
sdumitriu - (18:51): But for Jira, I think there's a remember me checkbox  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:51): I'll have to try that.  
sdumitriu - (18:51): utf8?  
sdumitriu - (18:52): Or the \'?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:52): \  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:53): Apparently mysql users are quite protected by the allowMultiQueries but I can't be sure of MsSql or Oracle users.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:54): + it's easy to check because users with PR can get a connection and try sending 2 queries like rollback; begin transaction; and see if it fails.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (18:57): Got your mail, it looks good. Thanks.
